metadata.title: CVE-2024-45002 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:rtla/osnoise: Prevent NULL dereference in error handlingIf the "tool->data" allocation fails then there is no need to callosnoise_free_top() and, in fact, doing so will lead to a NULL dereference.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
